message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it's a great fit for your needs and will provide significant value. I'm asking for $20,000 to start. What do you think?

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $16,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $13,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
